alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 15 at 10:53AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bradford, east central Alachua, northwestern Putnam and southwestern Clay Counties through 1130 AM EST... At 1053 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Orange Heights, or 7 miles west of Melrose, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Melrose, Hawthorne, Melrose Landing, Orange Heights, Lake Geneva, Florahome, Newnans Lake and Waldo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EST for northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Western Clay; Western Putnam
